name: dashboard-dialog-05
description: A seat selection dialog with capacity management, slider controls, switch toggles, and badge indicators for event or workspace planning.

{seats} setSeats(val)} max={maxSeats} step={1} className='[&>[data-slot=slider-track]]:h-2' />
